name: 蔡佩芳
objective: 介紹系統分析的基本概念及方法，深入熟悉開發一個系統之方法及步驟，分析各個子系統與元件的任務分派、協調與整合，最終達成計畫目標。本堂課程之重點，乃強調各系統設計的階段中，有利於整體團隊合作的工具介紹。內容包含：系統概念分析、系統功能分析、系統需求規格設計、系統功能測試與評鑑等之實施方式及步驟。
schedule:
week 1: Introduction to Systems, System Life Cycle
week 2: Conceptual System Design, Problem Identification
week 3: Preliminary System Design, Functional Analysis
week 4: Detail Design and Development, Design Requirements
week 5: System Test and Evaluation; Test Requirements
week 6: System Engineering Management Plan (SEMP)
week 7: Alternatives and Models in Decision Making
week 8: Optimization in Design and Operations
week 9: 期中考
week 10: Design for Reliability
week 11: Design for Maintainability
week 12: Design for Usability (Human Factors)
week 13: Design for Supportability (Serviceability)
week 14: Design for Disposability and Sustainability
week 15: Design for Affordability
week 17: Term Project Presentation
week 18: 期末考
scorePolicy:
上課出席佔 10%
作業佔 20%；
期中考佔 25%；
學期報告佔 20%；
期末考佔 25%。
materials: Blanchard, B.S. and Fabrycky, W.J. (2011), Systems Engineering and Analysis, 5th Edition, Prentice-Hill Int’l, Taipei. (Required)
